game.name: Rocket Wrestling Entertainment
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Throw it down in the newest sport league of 2073: Rocket Wrestling Entertainment. Pelt your foes with a barrage of rockets and powerful takedowns to stand on top!
